InputManager

Generic input manager I feel sick writing some of these control functors; rather than having some form of queryable game state we’re checking for the presence (and sometimes, the label contents) of UI elements to determine what state the game is currently in.

Author

Gedan

Summary
InputManagerGeneric input manager I feel sick writing some of these control functors; rather than having some form of queryable game state we’re checking for the presence (and sometimes, the label contents) of UI elements to determine what state the game is currently in.

Functions
InputManagerInit the InputManager.
ListenForNewBindMode toggle - keyboard events recieved by the input manager will be used to associated the incoming keycode with a new bound control method, removing the keycode from *other* bindings and updating data as appropriate.
StopListenForNewBind
AddBindableControlAdd a new action that can be associated with incoming key codes.
BindKeyToControlSet either the primary or secondary binding for a target control method to a given keycode.
RemoveExistingKeyBindRemove an existing key from a BoundControlMethod, if present, and shuffle the remaining key as appropriate
KeyHandlerThe core event handler we attach to the stage to capture incoming keyboard events.
ExecuteKeyCodeExecute the BoundControlMethod’s wrapped function associated with the given KeyCode
DisplayBindingPaneHide the mainText object and scrollbar, ensure the binding ScrollPane is up to date with the latest data and then show the binding scrollpane.
HideBindingPaneHide the binding ScrollPane, and re-display the mainText object + Scrollbar.
RegisterDefaultsRegister the current methods, and their associated bindings, as the defaults.
ResetToDefaultsReset the bound keys to the defaults previously registered.
GetAvailableFunctionsGet an array of the available functions.
GetControlMethodsGet an array of the currently active keyCodes.
ClearAllBindsClear all currently bound keys.
LoadBindsFromObjLoad bindings from a source “Object” retrieved from a game save file.
SaveBindsToObjCreate an associative object that can serialise the bindings to the users save file.

Functions

InputManager

public function InputManager(stage: Stage,  
debug: Boolean = true)

Init the InputManager.  Attach the keyboard event listener to the stage and prepare the subobjects for usage.

Parameters

param stage Reference to core stage on which to add display objects
param debug Emit debugging trace statements

ListenForNewBind

public function ListenForNewBind(funcName: String,  
isPrimary: Boolean = true):void

Mode toggle - keyboard events recieved by the input manager will be used to associated the incoming keycode with a new bound control method, removing the keycode from *other* bindings and updating data as appropriate.  Displays a message indicating the player should do the needful.

Parameters

param funcName BoundControlMethod name that they key is going to be associated with.  Set by a button callback function generated in BindingPane
param isPrimary Specifies if the incoming bind will replace/set the primary or secondary bind for a control. 

StopListenForNewBind

public function StopListenForNewBind():void
Mode togglereturn to normal keyboard event listening mechanics.  Shows the binding display again.

AddBindableControl

public function AddBindableControl(name: String,  
desc: String,  
func: Function,  
isCheat: Boolean = false):void

Add a new action that can be associated with incoming key codes.  This will mostly be static after first being initialized, this pattern was just easier to capture references to the required game functions without having to make the InputManager truely global or doing any namespacing shenanigans.  The closure can be declared with the rest of the game code, in the namespace where the functions are available, and still work inside this object.

Parameters

param name Name to associate the BoundControlMethod with
param desc A description of the activity that the BoundControlMethod does.  (Unused, but implemented)
param func A function object that defines the BoundControlMethods action
param isCheat Differentiates between a cheat method (not displayed in the UI) and normal controls. 

BindKeyToControl

public function BindKeyToControl(keyCode: int,  
funcName: String,  
isPrimary: Boolean = true):void

Set either the primary or secondary binding for a target control method to a given keycode.

Parameters

param keyCode The keycode to bind the method to.
param funcName The name of the associated BoundControlMethod
param isPrimary Specifies the primary or secondary binding slot

RemoveExistingKeyBind

public function RemoveExistingKeyBind(keyCode: int):void

Remove an existing key from a BoundControlMethod, if present, and shuffle the remaining key as appropriate

Parameters

param keyCode The keycode to remove. 

KeyHandler

public function KeyHandler(e: KeyboardEvent):void

The core event handler we attach to the stage to capture incoming keyboard events.

Parameters

param e KeyboardEvent data

ExecuteKeyCode

private function ExecuteKeyCode(keyCode: int):void

Execute the BoundControlMethod’s wrapped function associated with the given KeyCode

Parameters

param keyCode The KeyCode for which we wish to execute the BoundControlMethod for. 

DisplayBindingPane

public function DisplayBindingPane():void

Hide the mainText object and scrollbar, ensure the binding ScrollPane is up to date with the latest data and then show the binding scrollpane.

HideBindingPane

public function HideBindingPane():void

Hide the binding ScrollPane, and re-display the mainText object + Scrollbar.

RegisterDefaults

public function RegisterDefaults():void

Register the current methods, and their associated bindings, as the defaults.  TODO: Finish this shit off

ResetToDefaults

public function ResetToDefaults():void

Reset the bound keys to the defaults previously registered.

GetAvailableFunctions

public function GetAvailableFunctions():Array

Get an array of the available functions.

Returns

Array of available BoundControlMethods. 

GetControlMethods

public function GetControlMethods():Array

Get an array of the currently active keyCodes.

Returns

Array of active keycodes. 

ClearAllBinds

public function ClearAllBinds():void

Clear all currently bound keys.

LoadBindsFromObj

public function LoadBindsFromObj(source: Object):void

Load bindings from a source “Object” retrieved from a game save file.

Parameters

param source Source object to enumerate for binding data. 

SaveBindsToObj

public function SaveBindsToObj():Object

Create an associative object that can serialise the bindings to the users save file.

Returns

Dynamic object of control bindings.
